author: mschachter
msg: New file for creating struts-html tld and docs

author: mschachter
msg: This commit allows for nested/indexed properties in forms and in BeanUtils.populate(Object,Hashtable)
Modified setter methods inside of PropertyUtils to optionally allow converting of argument values
using BeanUtils.convert(), old method signatures still exist, but call on new methods with the convert
parameter set to "false"
Modified BeanUtils.populate() to use PropertyUtils to set values
Modified BaseFieldTag to use PropertyUtils to retrieve values for values
Submitted By:
Eric,Chris Audley,Ken X Horn, Matthias Kerkhoff

author: craigmcc
msg: Correctly look for Struts internal objects in application scope, not
page scope.

author: craigmcc
msg: Change <form:link page="/xxx"> and <form:link forward="xxx"> to render
absolute URLs for their hyperlinks, so that the expected behavior occurs
even when you use a <base> tag in your page.
(Also includes some updates to the TODO list for 1.1, extracted from
STRUTS-USER messages).
Submitted by: Deping Chian <deping.chian@infopoll.net>

author: craigmcc
msg: Add a forgotten (deprecated) method with the calling signature from Struts 0.5,
to remind people they need to update.
Also did several tweaks to the Javadoc comments.
